job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models for ad suitability, which falls under the core task of creating and adapting machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'predictive models' for campaign conversion likelihood, aligning with the definition of developing and training ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of predictive models based on user content consumption, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data processing and management within a big data environment, fitting the definition of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building data pipelines and monitoring systems, which is a key aspect of data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in building web applications, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CICD, which are central to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of model development, including experimentation, validation, implementation, and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building the data stack and pipelines, which is a core data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building an ML Ops platform, aligning with MLOps tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a typical software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to business teams indicates an understanding of business needs and aligning technical work with business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for models and applications implies understanding their business impact and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: 20% van de tijd werken aan features en modellen
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states working on features and models, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: 80% is bouwen aan de data stack, web applicaties & incrementele verbeteringen
job_tasks.justification: A significant portion of the role is dedicated to building the data stack and web applications, which are data engineering and software development tasks respectively.

soft_skills.phrase: je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers
soft_skills.justification: Working within a scrum team implies collaboration and communication with various roles.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in agile ceremonies like standups, refinements, retrospectives, and demos is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to both dev and business teams requires strong communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit
soft_skills.justification: The 'build it, run it' mentality signifies ownership and responsibility for the entire lifecycle of a product or feature.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly states taking ownership and accountability, which are key aspects of innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that heavily involves building and implementing predictive ML models (1.B.1) and managing data pipelines and infrastructure (1.B.3, 1.A.2). While there's mention of web applications and integration (1.A.1), the core focus is on traditional ML tasks within digital advertising, not generative AI. The technologies listed (Python, PySpark, Airflow) also align with traditional ML. There is a good balance between the 'AI Specialization' (Macro-Category B) and 'Core Software Engineering' (Macro-Category A) tasks, but the AI specialization is clearly in traditional ML, not GenAI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly listing the types of models to be built, the technologies to be used, and the responsibilities involved. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is also clear from the context of digital advertising and predictive modeling, making the profile assignment straightforward.
